TextView.android:text: The plant sensor that keeps your plants alive. Developed by plant scientists.
You want all your plants to be healthy and happy? Order three FLOS Sensor at once . A soil pH kit is included free of charge.
FLOS Sensor – PLANT LOVER BUNDLE OF 5

You want all your plants to be healthy and happy, and want to know how your plants are doing when you're out and about? Order our Plant Lover Bundle with five FLOS Sensor and a Wi-Fi Hub . A soil pH kit is included free of charge.
FLOS Sensor - PLANT LOVER BUNDLE OF 10

You want all your plants to be healthy and happy, and want to know how your plants are doing when you're out and about? Order our Plant Nerd Bundle with 10 FLOS Sensor for different plant sizes . The bundle comes with a Wi-Fi hub . And a soil pH kit is included for free.
The FLOS WiFi Hub is an optional extension of the FLOS Sensor System. Read all about the advantages of a FLOS WiFi Hub in the product description.
The FLOS Sensor delivers the best measurement results when the ground bars are adjusted to the plant size or root length.

Mit unserem pH-Kit kannst du messen, ob deine Pflanze in der richtigen Erde steckt Der passende pH-Wert ist wichtig für die Nährstoffzufuhr deiner Pflanze Je nachdem wie du gießt oder düngst, verändert sich der Wert: Eine regelmäßige Kontrolle lohnt sich!
